scripts.createFolder: mkdir build && cd build && mkdir scripts styles images
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run createFolder && npm run build:init
scripts.build:init: npm run build:js -s & npm run build:css -s & npm run build:images -s
scripts.build:css: postcss -m -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-properties -u postcss-calc -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-media-minmax -u postcss-custom-selectors -u postcss-color-function -u postcss-selector-matches -u postcss-selector-not -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 1%" "IE 9" -u postcss-neat --postcss-neat.neatMaxWidth "100%" app/styles/main.css -o build/styles/main.css
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm run createFolder && npm run prod:init
scripts.prod:init: npm run prod:js & npm run prod:css & npm run prod:images
scripts.prod:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] app/scripts/main.js | browserify -g uglifyify -o build/scripts/main.js
scripts.prod:css: npm run build:css && cssnano build/styles/main.css build/styles/main.css
scripts.lint: npm run jslint & npm run csslint
scripts.start: concurrently -k "npm run server:setup" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:images"
scripts.postbuild:init: echo 'CSS, Js and Images are well proceced'
scripts.postprod:init: echo 'CSS, JS and Images are optimised'
